PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-17272011-12-22DFAIT,  ,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SYRIA) REGULATIONS in order to prohibit imports from Syria; prohibit new investment in Syria of equipment including software, for the monitoring of telephone and Internet communications; and impose an assets freeze and a prohibition on dealings on additional individuals and entities associated with the Assad regime.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0330 Publication Date: 2012-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment
